content.detailedDescription:
On our 5 acre ranch doing a 6th grade science project on my back deck. i saw what looked like 7 or 8 stars in a triangle formation. it shot off in about 10 seconds at a speed out of this world. my mom barely remembers it. my brother-in-law saw the same kind, and he is very credible and even though a star trek fan, pretty anyallittical, reasonable, and a respected member of his large community. i've yet to ask him about his siting, because i only found out this thanksgiving, and we were all running around like holiday fools. anyway, over the years i've almost convinced myself it didn't happen. maybe the aliens affected our memory. i don't know, but once i started researching other sitings..I realized i wasn't alone on this. i've seen the same craft on 2 tv shows and numerous pictures on-line. the best example is the craft shown on the "giant triangles" episode on ufo hunters, and "chasing ufos" in august of 2012. i was calm when the craft was above the trees, but when it shot off...I knew something was coo coo in denmark. anyway, i'd love to answer any follow up questions you may have. i'll send a picture of our back field, and a sketch. other than that, i'd like to know if you are going to use my story on tv etc...I'll keep my eyes on the sky. thank very much

[name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: Our 5 acre ranch doing a 6th grade science project on my back deck i saw what looked like 7 or 8 stars in a triangle formation it shot off in about 10 secs at a speed out of this world. my mom barely remembers it. brother-in-law saw the same kind.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was with another co worker who was driving, we were waiting to pull out from our shop to head to the job site, while we were waiting to turn out i saw a metallic ball hovering in the sky across the street over a field, it didn't move, it was a fair distance away from us, it was just in cloud level.
we made our turn and when i looked for it it was gone, i saw nothing fly away or any planes in area.
i wish i had more to say about it but i live around a airport and know what helicopters and planes look like, this was like nothing i've seen before.
unfortunately my co worker wasn't paying attention to it and was trying to turn out so he didn't see it, leaving me as the only witness.
content.summary: Heading out for work, saw it across the street far out in the sky just hovering.

content.detailedDescription: The object looked like a round cloud, no sound just a ball of white gas with inner light pink slowly shifting to red and violet over and over, around 5;30 am it never moved, this cloud vanished with the sunrise and it was seen for many people and even it's already on the local news. thanks for let me share my experience...
content.summary: A round cloud with inner shifting light pink, red, violet

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home toward east windsor nj on route 33 westbound when i saw a set of bright lights to the south hovering over a treeline in the distance.  i turned left off of 33 and onto butcher road and saw a what is known as a black triangle ufo in the sky.  the craft was hovering and started moving very slowly to the south.  as i got closer it moved over the treeline that is to the south of the intersection of butcher and disbrow hill road.  i watched as the craft made an angular left turn, and then disappeared out of view from the treeline.  it did not appear to vanish or anything,  i just lost it in the trees. the craft had lights on the points of the triangle, which shifted in color from red to white to blue; and had a bright circle in the center (which i assume is the bottom of the craft).  the body of the craft was dark, probably black; and was visible while silhouetted against the night sky.  i put down my car window while stopped at the intersection and noted no noise other than that of my car for the duration of the sighting. i went down disbrow hill road, to perrineville road, turned around, and followed my path back to 33 in an effort to try and regain a visual sight of the craft but was unsuccessful.  

after doing some googling, i can attest that this sighting is in line with the many similar sightings that have been reported in the area.  i've noticed that clear nights nights where stars are extremely visible seem to be a common motif. 

i had a similar sighting in the are with another witness in my car about six years ago.  this was the same craft.  i decided to follow and try to get a picture or intercept as i promised myself i would never let something like this go undocumented again.  the first and only other time i saw this type of aircraft was in january of 2009 and it was was in the same area.  (perrineville / disbrow hill road; monroe/millstone, nj).  it should be noted that this area is in the vacinity of maguire afb. 

i am willing to answer any and all questions about this sighting.  i want it to be known that these things are out there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black triangle ufo sighted in monroe, nj and followed for 4 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
These fotos and descriptions are from my fiance' and her daughter, they are both trust worthy in their comments and fotos. they first noticed the lights-orbs days ago, i know managua and there is very little air traffic, all commercial planes have flight path that does not change landing at the sandino airport. 
her and her daughter only describe these as lights that appear over house sometimes from one way or another,some appear very high and large while others that descend are small, there is never sound. the objects are round and orb like, i asked her to out stretch a hand should one come near. the very last foto i will upload is her hand without the orbs all the other fotos are random shots, flash is used in the foto, to her judgement "they" do not like flash but they show up better in the fotos. her and her daughter remain confused and a little scared of the ongoing visitations. i have many more fotos i can upload, this is an ongoing event and i am willing to work along with mufon should an interest be generated.  this report references back to original case number 63483
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: This is an ongoing event nightly, reference case 63483

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my backyard at 4am smoking a cigarette, gazing at the sky when i saw a light move across the horizon slowly, then start to make abrupt, precise movements. 

when it first came into view, i thought it was a satellite making a pass, then it stopped. it seemed to stay stationary for a few seconds, then start moving back and forth horizontally. when it moved it seemed to return to it's original position each time. 

after 5 or 6 times going back and forth it made a sort of spiraling motion downwards, like when you drop a feather. it continued to make quick position changes afterwards, alternating between the horizontal back and forth movement, and making a sort of triangular path. 

the apparent distance traveled altogether was never more than the distance between the stars in orion's belt. 

i've never been a believer of ufos, but this was no airplane or helicopter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star like object observed making eratic manuevers in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on rochester road (about 6:45)i saw what looked like a bright star falling very fast (in a straight line down) from about 60-70 degrees to sight level until it got just above tree level.  it then stopped and began to flash a bright white light and traveled to the west until i could not see it because of tree obstruction.  i also saw a helicopter within a few degrees of sight from the object.  it is hard to say if they were close to each other but the helicopter had to have seen it.  most likely a traffic helicopter.
content.summary: While driving saw white light decend and stop at treetop level and started to flash white light

content.detailedDescription: Siteing of white orbs 3 groups of 10 or more. looked as if playing. had others join from different directions at high speed.Was in the eastern sky. felt a feeling of awe. they left in a ne direction. one stayed guess making sure all left.
content.summary: White orbs at play. other shooting in joining.

content.detailedDescription: Hello! myself abhishek. i had a ufo sighting 4 years ago. when i was going towards a park near my home,asusually i watched the sky. i noticed a red coloured disc shaped object hovering over me in the sky. it hovered in the sky for 2 minutes and suddenly dissapeared.Surprisingly, i was not scared. i was very ecxited. it was not making any noise. i beleive in aliens, so i had no surprise.
content.summary: I was going towards park. i suddenly saw a red coloured disc shaped hovering over me in the sky for 2 minutes. when i turned my head towards my friend for a second, it disappeared.T

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Saw a steady red light followed by helicopter on the skyline. as it approached i noticed it was of a triangular shape as it passed silently overhead. the helicopter in pursuit was of apache attack style. they were both moving rather quickly and as the ufo in question passed over us, the one viable light split into two giving the brief illumination of a triangular craft. both were headed roughly west towards long beach in a straight line. lost track when they passed over the house.
content.summary: Saw steady red light on skyline followed by helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I was working south of grand prairie, alberta off the forestry trunk road.  my business was working for oil companies, slashing trees on seismic lines. we were staying in a seismic camp as it was in a remote location. it was a small contract so i only had one worker with me. we left camp around 6:50 a.M. in january, it was a very starlight sky early in the morning, i turned off the main road to exit onto the line we were working on, i looked up in the sky and saw a bright light equivalent to the evening star, i said to my worker, there is a ufo, he responded laughing and said he didn't believe in ufo's. within seconds after seeing it, it turned into a light the size of a jet you would see coming in for a landing. we didn't realize the timeframe. it came down at the end of the seismic line, about a mile to about 2 miles from where we were on the line, it stopped, turned and came up adjacent to the truck above the tree tops. my worker, jumped out of the passenger side of the truck and hopped up onto the hood of my truck. i was driving and had stopped, i rolled my window down, and stared at the object in shock. the ufo was a huge cigar shape, there was no sound, the ship had huge big windows all the way down the length of the ufo.  underneath the huge windows, were small port hole windows.  they looked like the size of windows on a 747 jet. the windows were all lite up like looking into a house in the dark with lights on.  remember it was still dark! my worker and i stared at the ufo, but not sure how long it was there, then all of sudden, gently it started to glide away, turned off to the right, had a red pulsating light on the end of it. it was gone in a flash! then my worker jumped off the hood and got back into the truck.  we sat there and stared at each other for a few moments in disbelief of what we just witnessed. he asked me how i felt, i told him i felt like i had just drank a 26 of whiskey and woke up with a hangover, his reply was he felt the same. we both felt physically and mentally drained. we went on with our day, running our power saws and all day we both kept looking at the sky.  no cells, no photos!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw a ufo, cigar shaped, up close, unbelievable, this is the first i have shared with the public. wish i had pictures to share!

content.detailedDescription: My dad was driving me to taekwondo, when i saw this weird object that seemed to have two lights at the time. my dad was too focused on the road ahead, that he didn't notice it. the ufo was slowly hovering towards the northeast. then it stopped and hosted midair. it slowly turned so it faced me and silhouetted the night sky as a square~like shape. i could see one bright, white light on each corner. when we got out of the car, the yes we're blocking my view so i couldn't see what happened next.
content.summary: This square ufo was hovering slowly then stopped. it hovered midair and turned so all four lights faced me.

content.detailedDescription: This thing is in illinois right now. last seen near marion, akin illinois.Someone else please look!
content.summary: Appeared southeast hovering above trees, disc like, lost sight, seconds later was north east orb appearance

content.detailedDescription: This is a follow up report i had mufon contact his name was jack or james. i have emailed him back several times.I had responses but recently have gotten none you have this case on file with my e mail address. i'm not done there is so much to tell i don't want to write back and forth i want to talk to someone.
content.summary: This is a follow up report

content.detailedDescription: On february 17,2015 my sister and i was out with my friend and her kids. we decided to go to her house. she calls me and tells me theirs jets flying around her house which is strange here in fresno at night. and she jokes it was a ufo. i was looking in the air and saw i bright light looked like a star at first. but it was to low. then we drove closer to it and got out of the car and started recorded. it started flying higher towards the sky. blinking and flashing bright lights. it would disappear and reappearing. it was skimming through the air! going up and down and back and forth. we saw the aircraft, it was a round object with three round angles. it was very bright and had no sound. then we heard jets flying. two military jets appeared out of no where and was just following it. another bright object also appeared in the sky they started to fly farther away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was hovering our a house miles away. then started flying up and cross the sky. skipping through the sky with no sound. then two military jets shows up and try to follow it.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing video games with my friend when i saw out of the corner of my eye a light through the curtains. i stood up and walked over to my window and i saw a blueish-white light in the wwn sky and saw the light stationary i stood for a while thinking it was venus because of its brightness. i went to look at the paper and the only planet/star was mercury in the east the next morning. so i though mabey it was a meteor or space debris entering the atmosphere. but i watched it for about 15 minutes, and it never moved then i saw a second yellow light fly near it and dissapear. now even though there are clouds tonight it pulsated even when there were no clouds near it. by the way the clouds were outlined in the sky and the objects light could be seen through them. it's about 30 mins later and its gone after reveiwing the time lapse i took with my phone it does not move and i have video proof i will post on youtube.
content.summary: Strange stationary light

content.detailedDescription:
I have a title to this account of my story: a ufo as the planchette and the sky as a magical message board indicator. a couple of invention ideas, personal difficulties, and a personal note about disclosure surrounds this event. it was january 31, 2015 about 7:30 pm eastern time. while i was lying in bed seriously contemplating moving out of the group home where i live i was looking out of my bedroom window hoping to see something, a sign in the form of a ufo. i saw a distant plane go by and thought well that's just a plane. and i was thinking just close my eyes and go to sleep but i didn't and in about 2 minutes after this thought a dim circular light appeared in the night sky in front of the tree across the street descended straight down stopped and then disappeared by fading out. this downward motion and dim light indicated two things to me. one down with the idea of moving out and second that this idea was a dim idea to begin with.I usually get my messages from the psychic circle but this night was special. this ufo was communicating to me in the same way that my invention idea would have ufos communicating to people out there at area 51 if they purchased my invention idea stardust a non terrestrial magical message board indicator. i have a special symbol that i want to place on the planchette of stardust which looks like a star a toy spinning top and a tornado all in one. this symbol originates from the lines of the palm of my right hand. i consulted the psychic circle about this dim circular light and its reply was as usual far, old, near, and wait other. after about ten years of the psychic circle indicating wait other i finally know who this other person is. i am still waiting(i have been hung out to dry so to speak while i wait) but this person has informed me in the past at the old group home that when we get moved into the new group home things would start getting ten times better for me and they have.

i also had a precognitive dream about the february first 2003 columbia tragedy with a ufo included in the dream and an actual synchronicity ufo sighting about a week after the dream something said go and look and i saw a ufo.
content.summary: A dim circular light appeared(like someone throwing a light switch) in the night sky in front of the tree across the street descended straight down and disappeared by fading out.

content.detailedDescription: I made my way out of work & drove to target store, after i parked started walking & my co-worker & i both saw by the contrails a huge spot of aurora borealis super bright colors to the left side of the sun but quite far away from it. we appreciated it for about almost 2 minutes, i did not have my phone with me so went back to the car to get it & snap a photo and the event was gone, leaving the huge spot of gray cloud formation of where it was. at the time about 5 contrail planes were spraying in different directions. it was amazing, never have i experienced that aurora event in person, specially not in new jersey!
content.summary: Rare aurora borealis

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just gotten back home from a trail ride with our horses. i went into the house, she went to shut our front gate. she screamed for me to come back outside and look at this thing that was in the sky. as i approached our front gate , to the east was up in the sky was three huge amber looking lights, pulsating at different intervals. between the lights we could make out a shape that looked beveled, a ufo. the object was huge and we estimate about 15 miles away. i called to my teenage step-son to turn on my scanner load and for them to come out and see. my scanner was going crazy with police and fire dept., wondering what this thing was. when my step son came out, we starting joking about waiting to go for a ride. my teenage daughter came out and was terrified by what we were seeing. we told her to get camera take pictures, but when film was developed they were totally blank. we stood and watch what we believe to be a ufo for 15 minutes as it remained stationary in the sky. this thing was was huge. after 15 minutes we saw 5 jets come in from the north and 5 jets come in from the south. we could tell by their blue and green blinking lights. the object shut down the lights, then was gone. the jets continued to search the skies for at least another half hour searching for the object, in a search pattern. then we heard on the scanner the forestry dept., claim that it just was kids playing with air-reil flares. i know flares they do not pulsate they flicker. we never heard any more about the incident after that.
content.summary: Wife went out to shut front gate. screamed for me to come out and witeness # pulsing amber lights in the sky. hovered for app.15 min. then jets came in from  lights went off, dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Saw about ten lights in the sky the lights disappeared. and more keep pooping out then something black started coming down and it got close r n closer then dissapered
content.summary: Lots of lights and black shadow figure

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I have seen a lot so i will give you a couple that i seen---i was in my fifties and came home it was broad daylight and i layed on the sofa to take a nap in the afternoon then quickly decided to have a cup of tea.When i tried to get up i could not move a muscle only my eyes>i could hear whispering and i could see shadows on the wall>it lasted for about five minutes till the voices and the shadows dissapeared.I could then move and my imediate response was to look out the window where i saw a purple coloured triangle up in the sky it imediately took off in an easterly direction and that was that one that i saw.

another one i saw i was with a girlfriend in my apartment in ontario and decided to go out on the balcony to get some fresh air.I looked up in the night sky and noticed an object about the size of my little pinkie finger moving across the sky it was a yellow color.All of a sudden it shot to the left at a high rate of speed and made a ninety degree turn and in a flash it dissapeared over the horizon.I went and got my girlfriend and brought her outside to discribe what i saw and the think returned and made the same moves except in the opposite direction.I figured it was the same craft as the first one>it must have went around the world and returned to the same area.

i have seen many ufos and this is the first time i am reporting this to anyone.I am 68 years old now and have many times thought about going under hypnosis to find out if i ever was abducted but never did.And never reported any of these incidents
content.summary: Over 200 ufos in my life from when i was 12 till 3 years ago over 200 sightings altogether

content.detailedDescription: have just heard about this from a friend.
content.summary: Crashed into lake winnipeg on the jackhead indian reservation in manitoba canad

content.detailedDescription:
It's real simple , for the last 4 months or so.I see a bunch of star like objects above my house.That move and fire comes from the sky and disappear.My
thinks there dones. i know there not.Every night, i see them ofcouse. i've taken picture.She's just scared.It started about 4 months ago ,me and my family come back from eating and when i got out of the car something told me to look up... that's when i sew two stars flying together.. in not a normal way.And from that day on..I always started paying attention to the sky.And what i see every night above my house isn't normal..Or from this planet.At first i was scared. but it's too the point,i feel like there watching over me. where ever i go at night now i see that star.I know there extraterrestrial intelligence out, there all you gotta do is come to my house seeing is believing.Picture are picture, video are video,but being a witness to something special,its real.The truth to every thing our history,every thing...Its about to change,something big is gonna,happen..
content.summary: I see them everynight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside and was walking toward my car. i always like to see the stars and i keep an eye out for ufo's just for fun. i was looking at three stars and noticed a fourth to the right of the three. as i was walking i thought it was moving but maybe it only appeared to be moving because i was walking, so i stopped. when i stopped i noticed that it seemed to still be moving, in a straight line though. i thought maybe it was a meteorite because it was so far up. it looked like a star, very close to the size of the three other stars near it. they were all white with a tint of blue.

i watched it for a second over the oquirrh mountains head west and down toward the horizon. within a couple seconds after i stopped i noticed that it abruptly changed direction and went up, complete opposite direction. the it changed again but curved to the right and back down toward the horizon. then it changed again and headed right then curved and went down then curved and went left. then it changed direction again and headed down then curved to the left and curved and started heading back up. it basically traced a three-leaf clover path as best as i can describe it. then it started to change directions rapidly but within a small area, maybe the size of a dime if i had held it up to the sky. it was moving slowly and at a constant pace but kept changing directions quite a bit. once it started doing that i called out to my wife who was just north of me and said "what the **** is that?!". as soon as she started to look over to where it was, it headed toward the horizon in a straight line and slowly disappeared. but she didn't see it in time anyway.

she said that when i had called out to her she saw a flash in the sky to the north and wasn't sure what it was. soon after the incident, the clouds moved in and covered everything. didn't see anything else after that.

i'd guess the speed of the object was anywhere between mach 2 and 3 or maybe faster, assuming it was out in space or at least really high up in the atmosphere. i've seen jets go mach 1 and they wouldn't be able to keep up with this object. i'm not sure how it changed direction so often. that's the thing that made me come here to report it. most objects i see in the sky are explainable but this one is one of those that i can't explain away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Looked like star but changed directions constantly

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the mail box about 11:30.I heard what sounded like an airplane or jet so i looked up and saw a long line whitish,and a oval shape,then it disappeared. i felt a little scared at the time.
content.summary: Their was a long line whiteish then i saw an ovel white then it disappered

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the street broadway in spokane valley. i was looking out my window se at the chemtrails. i then saw an oval like shape that was reflective, almost like liquid metal just inside one of these chemtrails. after i saw the surface of the craft reflect the sunlight, it immediately put out a burst of white light and disappeared. almost like the light exploded and then got sucked back in. the sighting only lasted about 3-5 seconds but was incredible!
content.summary: Saw a refection of the craft and then suddenly it let off a bright white light and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Been visted  many times scence i was young diffcult to remeber now over 60 now many time wake up new scoops one both legs and perminite marke on left arm always seems to icth sorry about spelling cant remmeber seem to have unusaul sounds in head like humming sleep study said i have unsual alfr waves
content.summary: Bad dreams six years old

content.detailedDescription: Mientras conducamos en el automvil por la autopista buenos aires la plata al llegar al peaje observo una luz naranja muy fuere del tamao de 3 o 4 estrellas juntas dirigindose al norte de buenos aires sobre el rio de la plata, yo lo vi desde aqu aprox http://goo.Gl/maps/jykkc pens que se trataba de un avin ya que haba 2 aviones en el rea, pero repentinamente el objeto se separo en dos objeto y luego se desvanecieron, esto duro unos 53 segundos, estimo que los objetos se encontraban en esta locacin http://goo.Gl/maps/sucu1 no eran aviones.
content.summary: 2 luces del tamao de 3 estrellas brillanes se separan en dos y desvanecen

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were driving at night on my block on the west side of town in wenatchee, wa when we saw something moving slowly in the sky that looked like a long red cylinder shaped object that was moving towards us. i turned the car lights off and with that the object continued moving toward us but when we realized that it was something highly unusual in the sky, my friend and i freaked out. we both began screaming, scared at what was coming towards us and i turned the car lights on and a split second later we watched the object that had been coming towards us turn to the side a bit and in the next second it vanished and we couldn't find it anymore. i can't say how close or how big it was but i have terrible eyesight and without glasses on i could clearly see it.
content.summary: Redish long skinny cylinder- like object in the night sky, moved slowly and took off suddenly

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We have lands in the badlands of south dakota, just  15 miles south of  kadoka,sd and interstate 90. while it was in the late 80's and i was just a kid, me and my family members remember every detail of that night, and to this day still wonder what we saw. it was about 8-9pm mountain time  and we were at one of our home sites on a hill, desolate area. but close to the balkans in the area. we saw what looked like evening stars rising from the badlands/horizon. they were bright like the north start and we thought, why so many. as there were 4-5.As the night went on the lights stayed stationary and the rest of the stars moved on as thru normally did, yet these bright lights stayed in their same area.  after about an hr we realized they were not stars and they were closer to us than we realized.  at this time my older brother decided to flash his car head lights at them, of course his car is facing toward the badlands.  at this time, one of the lights started to come toward us. my mom got scared and told my brother to stop. so he did, but not before the object got about 10ft from us and about 20 ft above us and shining to big white rectangular lights down on us. no noise or sounds associated with it. it was as if it noticed who and what we were and at that moment, shut it's lights off and in seconds, went straight up into the  dark sky and towards the stars, disappearing. yet the other lights stayed on the horizon above the badlands, and just sat there. well by this time my mom makes us all get in the car and head toward our other property about 2 miles west. when we get there we get into another vehicle and go sitting on a hill to watch what the other lights would do. after about an hr after what we experienced at our other property, we witnessed the other stationary lights going in their own directions, some up, some down, some circling each other, and even one displaying multiple lights like a police cars flashing lights, than suddenly disappearing. after about 3-5 hrs of us witnessing these crazy light dances, stand stills, and ascendances, they all just went straight up in to the clear night sky, and disappeared. they would appear and disappear so fast and with no noise, it was like, falling stars, and you could barely track them. it's nite been years since any of my family talked about this, but we all know what we saw and where were saw it. i write only because, after all these years and many of my family living on this land, still no one saw anything like what we saw. our family's have lived on this land for at least  a 100 yrs. but as of recently on the same lands we have noticed military grade helicopters flying around the badlands where we saw the objects , and various off road terrain type vehicles. it now peaks our interest, and maybe you can help with this mystery. thank your you're, time and if i can give you more detail,i would be glad to that. as this land it's in indian territory and i don't understand why the military would be out this way, and if so, for what?
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright star like, stationary, than fast and straight at us, flashing, and straight up
